buffer.description: The id (JSON property name) of the buffer.

byteOffset.description: The offset into the buffer in bytes.

byteLength.description: The length of the buffer-view in bytes.

target.description: Valid values are 34962 (ARRAY_BUFFER) or 34963 (ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER). When not provided, the buffer-view contains animation or skin data.  WebGL: see bindBuffer().
